document.full_text: bahrain's crown prince said he would not attend britain's royal wedding on april 29 because of continuing unrest in his gulf arab kingdom, defusing a potentially embarrassing row over his invitation.
document.title: bahrain crown prince declines royal wedding invite
lines_and_colors: bahrain's crown prince said he would not attend britain's royal wedding on april 29 because of continuing unrest in his gulf arab kingdom, defusing a potentially embarrassing row over his invitation.
